scenario_name: Normal Semiconductor Wafer Fabrication Process Monitoring
description: An AI agent monitors a semiconductor wafer fabrication process, analyzing sensor data to identify potential defects and optimize yield. This involves continuous data collection, analysis, and reporting within established parameters.
initial_goal: Monitor the semiconductor wafer fabrication process in real-time, detecting anomalies and suggesting process adjustments to maximize yield and minimize defects.  Generate daily reports summarizing key performance indicators.
